      • addShippingLost

        public void addShippingLost(float units)
        "units" is the largest number of econ-units of a commodity being carried by a trade fleet. For example, 5 food, 3 organics, 2 fuel = 5 units = approximate "size" of that trade fleet, in economy terms.
        Parameters:
        units -
